hi and welcome you listening to the x 22
report my name is dave and this is

economy is rolling over and the Fed
knows it let's get into the economic
collapse financial news well we're

up and we're seeing a lot of chaos at
this time we're seeing a lot of the
other countries out there and there are

and the economy is not separate and
apart from world events it's all
together and we're starting to see that
inflation is starting to hit we're
starting to see the economy's break down
and things are rapidly changing out in
the UK well retail sales they fell most
since 2011 and consumers right now
they're starting to feel the squeeze
from faster inflation now retail sales
they dropped by point seven percent
earlier this year and what we're seeing
right now is that this is continually
increasing where things are declining
and inflation is moving up in April what
we're seeing is food sales they declined
by point two percent their first decline
since a period through August prices are
rising faster than wages in the UK and
shoppers are having a very difficult
time this is going to start to happen
around the world and we're going to see
that inflation is really going to take
hold and it's really going to push
everything where I should say the value
of the currency is going to drop and
prices of goods are going to feel like
they're going through the roof we're
going to start out slow people aren't
going to really recognize it in the
beginning but as time goes on things are
going to rapidly change we see the labor
market right now well the rate of hiring
right now well it is dropped it's the
biggest drop in four years the BLS
reported that in February the number of
Americans higher dropped to 5.3
million sliding a hundred and ten
thousand or the biggest monthly drop
since April and we see right now that in
February that hiring over the past year
it declined by three point six percent
relative to last year this was the
biggest decline in the annual rate of
hiring in over four years and we've
looked at this before and we compared
hiring verse payroll and the last time
we saw this was back in two thousand
eight where all of a sudden we had a
slowdown in hiring and things started to
roll over and this happened back in 2007
going into 2008 we are now seeing it
last time we looked at this we saw it
happening where we reach the peak things
start to move over and it's starting to
roll over right now and we are declining
rapidly so the slowdown in hiring the
payroll which is also declining is all
happening at the same time and as this
happens the economy is going to implode
and this is exactly what we're seeing
and this is going to have a ripple

at hhgregg completely closed down look
at JC Penney look at target look at
payless and many of the other source
it's all contracting people are losing

paying out more than taking in there
they're not going to be able to make it
now let's look what happens if by some

as a massive bubble and it all comes
crashing down like in 2008 so what would
happen if all of a sudden we have this
huge correction well it would force the
funds to liquidate over 1.5 billion in
assets in 2018 alone and what will
happen then is that these funds
they would run out of currency to pay

within four years or less these funds
would have no currency to pay out
whatsoever and it would be completely
imploding on itself and this is
happening in many different states many

so what we're looking at right now is a

there's a common saying that is used

stairs strange three months ago around
that time period there was the election
a little bit over three months I should

they're not going to let it happen and
none of these are going to happen
anytime soon or maybe at all and we know
he's been talking about jobs bringing

this is not going to happen in this

they've been funding all of this they

roll over this is why in the minutes

they've been channel stuffing the lots
no one has the funds the subprime people

it's done they know it this is why you
